jd: From: Ranjith, VRN ranjith@vrntech.us Reply to: ranjith@vrntech.us Hi Vendors,Hope you are doing well,Please see the below job description and let me know your interest. Role: Pega CSSA developerLocation: Whippany, NJ - HybridDuration: Long Term ContractNote: Need Locals only Job Description: Pega CSSA developer (Smart Dispute)Must have: CSSA Certification & Smart DisputeMust have relevant project experience implementing the Pega Smart Dispute framework.Should have working knowledge of Activities, Flows (Screen Flow, Tab Flow, Adding decision, sub-flows & integration to Flow ), UIs rules, Harness, Sections, Portals, Local Action, Flow Action, Data Transform, Correspondence, Rule Inspector, properties types, validation rulesMust have knowledge of decision and declarative rules.Must have a working knowledge of at least one or two Pega OOTB integrations (SOAP, MQ, SQL, File, etc.)Good understanding of PPRC properties, types, and relevance, Understand the decision types and decision rules in Pega.Possesses good knowledge of Pega construction and debugging tools such as tracer utility, clipboard, app accelerators, documentation tools, expression builders, and form builders.Sound understanding of user interface both Pega out of the box and generic.Good understating of Pega flows, interpretation of flow shapes, SLAs, tickets, interpretation of complex flow shapes for business scenarios, activities, activity step methods, OOTB activitiesExperience or knowledge in Pega 8.x is preferable.Should have Good Communication Skills.
